100% pure Java Libary
The driver can be used in the Java SDK Environment
Platform Independent

Uses of Package
PLCCom

Classes in PLCCom used by PLCCom
BasicInfoResult
          return PLC Basic Info
BlockListEntry
          return a definition of a existing Block
BlockListLengthResult
          return a definition of a existing Block
BlockListResult
          returns a list of existing blocks
ConnectCallbackNotifier
          Event notifier ConnectCallbackNotifier for the iConnectCallback event
ConnectionStateChangeNotifier
          Event notifier ConnectionStateChangeNotifier for the iConnectionStateChange event
ConnectResult
          Describes a connect Result
CPUModeInfoResult
          return CPU Mode Info
CPUModeInfoResult.eCPUModeInfo
          define CPU mode identifier the actual CPU mode like switch or key setting (Run, Stop or Startup)
CPUModeInfoResult.eCPUStateInfo
          define CPU state identifier the actual CPU state (Run, Stop or Startup)
DiagnosticInfoEntry
          return a definition of a diagnostic entry
DiagnosticInfoResult
          returns a list of actual diagnostic entrys
eBaudrate
          define Device Com Baudrate
eBlockLanguage
          represents the using Blocklanguage
eBlockType
          enum of supported block types
eConnectionState
          enum of actual connection state
eDataType
          enum of supported Datatypes
ePLCType
          Define the PLC Type
eRegion
          Describe the typ of PLC address
eSpeed
          PLC/MPI circle speed default 187k
eTypeOfCommunication
          Enum decribes Type of Communication
iConnectCallback
          Interface for the iConnectCallback event
iConnectionStateChange
          Interface for the iConnectionStateChange event
LEDInfoResult
          return PLC LED Info
LEDInfoResult.eLEDFlashing
          define LED flashing
LEDInfoResult.eLEDIdentifier
          define LED identifier
LEDInfoResult.sLEDInfo
          return PLC LED Info
MC7BlockInfo
          returns a set of informations from actual bytestream of block
MC7BlockInfo.BlockFooter
          representing the footer of actual block
MC7BlockInfo.BlockHeader
          representing the head of actual block
OperationResult
          Describes a PLC Operation Result
OperationResult.eQuality
          a enum member with the information whether a function has been successfully performed
PLCClockTimeResult
          return PLC clock time
PLCcomDevice
          abstract base class of device classes
ReadItemRequest
          Describes a readitem request
ReadItemRequestCollection
          Describes a collection of ReadItemRequests
ReadItemResult
          Returns a result of a readitem operation
ReadItemResultCollection
          Describes a collection of ReadItemResults
ReadPLCBlockResult
          Returns a result of a block read operation
ReadRequest
          Describes a read request
ReadResult
          Returns a result of a read operation
SystemStatusListItemEntry
          represents an system status list-Item
SystemStatusListResult
          Returns a result of a read operation
WritePLCBlockRequest
          Describes a block write request
WriteRequest
          Describes a write request
WriteResult
          Returns a result of a write operation
